summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on April 20, 2011. The email discusses confidentiality and attorney-client privilege, indicating that it is intended solely for the recipient. The communication emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley are connected through this email correspondence.

keyFacts: The email emphasizes confidentiality and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
The communication is intended solely for Jes Staley and unauthorized use is prohibited.
The email was sent on April 20, 2011.
